entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake is described as sending a message to You-Know-Who and attacking Hermione. It is also mentioned that it came out of Bathilda’s neck.

entities.name: bathildas
entities.description: Bathilda is mentioned as the source from which the snake came out of.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who did not need to know the details about the snake.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as the person to whom the snake sent a message and for whom Hermione was kept.

relationships.description: The text states that the snake came out of Bathilda’s neck.
The text mentions that the snake sent a message to You-Know-Who.
The text states that Hermione was attacked by the snake.
The text mentions that Hermione was kept for You-Know-Who.
